title: Chat restricted for calling out a troll, need clarification.
body:
I had a master yi 1 trick in my game that instalocked rengar jungle despite yi being up. He then says he doesn't care and wants to have fun. This fucking ranked, we are here to try our best to win. If you want to play jungle rengar with flash ignite, go play normals. (He doesn't even take smite, he takes flash ignite instead). He then proceeds to troll by not doing anything and going top to leech xp (Trolling). I call him out and I get chat restricted. Yes I know past games effect the restriction, but this is a fucking disgrace.
